import i from './interCard.module.scss' import h from '../../components/Header/Header.module.scss' import s from '../Home.module.scss' import CardKarzinaAdd from '../../components/Content/img/cardKarzinaAdd.svg'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import blud from './img/inter__bl.svg' import CardInfo from '../../components/Content/CardInfo' import Card from '../../components/Content/Card' import ContentLogo from '../../components/Content/ContentLogo' export default function InterCard ({ isAddedToCart, karzinkaTovar, addBasket, Goods, }) { const params = useParams() const userId = Goods.findIndex(user => user.id === +params.userId) const mas = Goods[userId] console.log(mas); return ( <> {mas &&

{mas.title}

{mas.description}

Состав: {mas.compound}

{mas.weight} г.

{mas.calories} калл.

{mas.price} руб.

{isAddedToCart ? (
) : ( )}
{isAddedToCart ?

Товар добавлен в карзину

: ''}
}
{Goods.map( (info , index) => { return item.id === info.id)} {...info} /> } )}
) }
